verbose_text: ER protein folding and modification are highly sensitive to disturbances of ER homeostasis, including altered glycosylation, oxidative stress, energy deprivation, ER Ca 2+ depletion, increased mRNA translation, altered metabolic status, and inflammatory stimuli.
evidence: protein folding and modification are highly sensitive to disturbances of ER homeostasis, including altered glycosylation, oxidative stress, energy deprivation, ER Ca 2+  depletion, increased mRNA translation
